mapper.select: SELECT mn.title AS title, mn.detailed AS detailed, mn.create_time AS createTime, mn.begin_time AS beginTime, mn.end_time AS endTime, mmc.message_id AS messageId, mn. STATUS AS status, mmc.is_read AS isRead, mmc.identity_type AS identityType, mmc.user_id AS userId FROM message_notification mn LEFT JOIN message_member_conference mmc ON mn.id = mmc.message_id WHERE mmc.identity_type = #{identityType} AND mmc.user_id = #{userId} AND mn.create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY mn.create_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(mmc.is_read) FROM message_notification mn LEFT JOIN message_member_conference mmc ON mn.id = mmc.message_id WHERE mmc.identity_type = #{identityType}
AND mmc.user_id = #{userId} AND mmc.is_read=FALSE AND mn.create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY mn.create_time DESC
